Current Release Date: 8 March 2011

This report covers 2011-03-04 to 2011-03-08

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved


Code Changes From CVS/GIT Repositories


ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2011_03_04.shtml
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.11139/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/libzmapfoocanvas/foo-canvas.c: fix bug which disabled all motion events to foocanvas items, we need motion events when there is a modifier key.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowSequenceFeature.c: fix by a bit of a hack bug whereby we fall off the end of dna when clicking at end of peptide sequence.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: fix bug in dna/peptide coord display when revcomp'd + improve mouse debug messages.
